Package com.mssrchapelier.TigreParser

Class TigreParserCliLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mssrchapelier.TigreParser.TigreParserCliLauncher
  • public class TigreParserCliLauncher
extends java.lang.Object

    The command-line interface for TigreParser.

    The only public member of this class is the main method, whose String arguments are parsed by an instance of JCommander.Builder. The accepted arguments are as follows:

    • (no flag): input file path (required);
    • -o, --output: output file path (optional; is set to output_input_file_path if omitted);
    • -c, --config: .json configuration file path (optional; if omitted, the default value will be specified by TigreParser and equals /res/config.json);
    • -n, --numanalyses: the maximum number of analyses for each (word) token to print to the output file (optional; must be a non-negative integer - checked by jcommander.validators.PositiveInteger; if omitted, all non-empty analyses will be printed, as specified by TigreParser).

    The instance method run, called by main, accesses TigreParser's its builder (TigreParserBuilder) through its builder method, passes the TigreParserCliLauncher instance's non-null arguments (the methods setConfigFilePath and setMaxAnalyses of TigreParserBuilder), calls the builder's build method to construct a TigreParser object and calls the latter's processFile method, passing the input and output file names as the arguments. If an IOException or a ConfigParseException are thrown by build or processFile, a message indicating the failure to configure the parser or to process the file respectively is printed to standard output along with the exception's stack trace.
